title: Team Profile Generator
intro: A Node.js command-line application to generate an HTML webpage displaying employee information
description: This application prompts questions in the comand line to take in information about employees on a software engineering team and generates an HTML file, creating a profile for each employee so that the manager can quickly access information about them.
deployedLink: An example HTML generated by the application can be viewed at https://github.com/naomimardon/Team-Profile-Generator/blob/main/output/team.html

title: Love Lounge
intro: A place to find your perfect match
description: A group project to build a dating app, offering the chance to find a deeper connection with people, based on shared interests rather than just looks. The app also suggests an activity to do together based on those shared interests.

title: Weather Dashboard
intro: A weather dashboard displaying the 5 day forecast for multiple cities of the user's choice
description: This application uses the geocoding and 5 day weather forecast apis from OpenWeather to provide a five day weather forecast for the city of the user's choice. The app uses local storage to store the last five cities searched for so the user can easily revisit the forecast when they reopen or refresh the page.

title: Workday Scheduler
intro: An app to help plan a day's workload
description: This is a simple application to help plan a day's workload. The working day (9am-5pm) is broken into hourly slots that have been created dynamically using jquery. You can enter tasks into the timeblock for the hour when you want to complete that task. Click Save and the task will persist when the page is refreshed or closed and reopened.

title: Coding Quiz
intro: A quiz to test bootcamp students on their coding knowledge
description: This timed multiple choice quiz is designed to test the knowledge of bootcamp students. The app runs in the browser and features dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by JavaScript, to move through the questions and display a table of the three highest scores at the end. For each incorrect quess, 10 seconds is taken off the timer and the quiz won't move on until the question is answered correctly.

title: Password Generator
intro: An application to randomly generate a password based on criteria selected by the user
description: This application randomly generates a password based on a user's answers to prompts about the required length of the password and whether ot not it should contain special characters, numbers, lower case letters or upper case letters.
